name: Rifle Strike
description:
A new fast-paced FPS shooter FOR FREE!

Enjoy a First Person shooter the way I wanted to see it!

The full release will contain:
- Various maps and gamemodes
- Unique weapons, weapon camos
- Scorestreaks
- Single-Player
- Co-op
- Progression system

This game is and will be completely micro-transaction free! You will never have to pay to get better equipment!
Weapons are accessible through cash earned during a match.

This whole game is being developed by me, a single person, so please understand that!
My goal is simply to make a fun free to play game.
